About.paragraph: I'm Frankie G Riviera, This is a website for a fictional bakery that is used to demonstrate technological scenarios using Microsoft Azure.

Apphostingguide.paragraph: The Azure Application Hosting Guide brings clarity to individuals, startups and businesses to help them navigate the complex world of application hosting in Azure. With so many offerings it can be challenging to understand the pros, cons and ideal scenarios for each service. This guide is your solution
Why: Expert knowledge and real world experience based on years at Microsoft and working with customers using Azure
Understand the key decisions that must be considered when selecting your application hosting service
Learn about app hosting services including, Azure App Service, Azure Kubernetes Service, Azure Container Apps and More!
Get pros and cons breakdown with use case considerations for each service
Understand the optimal scenarios with specific resources included with each app hosting service

Videogallery.title: 3 Tips that will get you any job
This Book changed my life. (And could change Yours too!)
5 blockers to your goals and dreams. (And how to overcome them!)
Why you NEED both goals and dreams to WIN at life

Features.title: Free Eductaion
Features.text: Quick simple overview and demo videos to equip you with the knowledge you need to save you time

Features.title: Free Downloads
Features.text: Subscribe below to get the complete list of Azure learning resources that even Microsoft employees use to stay up to date!

Features.title: Digital Assets
Features.text: Curated Azure resources that help you make high impact decisions quickly and confidently
